column5: Anyone have the name of a motel in or near Vermillion Bay / Dryden area that has food and bar?
I'll be spending the night there next Friday.
Stayed at the Best Western in June and it has a bar and restaurant with good food. Try to get a ground floor room so you can park by your room and sit outside if you want.
Northside Motel 807-227-5339 on the 17 in Vermillion Bay has rooms with kitchenettes, and there are several places nearby to eat.
If you stay in VB, you can eat at Busters BBQ.....an unpaid endorsement by a fat and happy customer.
